div.div: Texas Lutheran vs. SW Assemblies of God

tr.td: SAGU wins coin toss and defers. TLU will receive.

Brent Peavy pass complete to Casey Davis for loss of 2 yards to the TLU30 (Ben Atkinson).
Brent Peavy pass incomplete to Lewis Williams.
